symbols.docstring: The Supabase MCP (Management Control Panel) provides a set of tools for managing your Supabase projects programmatically. This guide will help you use
symbols.name: Getting Started with Supabase MCP

children.docstring: Lists all Supabase projects for the user.
children.name: `list_projects`

children.docstring: Gets details for a Supabase project.
children.name: `get_project`

children.docstring: Gets the cost of creating a new project or branch. Never assume organization as costs can be different for each.
children.name: `get_cost`

children.docstring: Ask the user to confirm their understanding of the cost of creating a new project or branch. Call `get_cost` first. Returns a unique ID for this confi
children.name: `confirm_cost`

children.docstring: Creates a new Supabase project. Always ask the user which organization to create the project in. The project can take a few minutes to initialize - us
children.name: `create_project`

children.docstring: Pauses a Supabase project.
children.name: `pause_project`

children.docstring: Restores a Supabase project.
children.name: `restore_project`

children.docstring: Lists all organizations that the user is a member of.
children.name: `list_organizations`

children.docstring: Gets details for an organization. Includes subscription plan.
children.name: `get_organization`

children.docstring: Lists all tables in a schema.
children.name: `list_tables`

children.docstring: Lists all extensions in the database.
children.name: `list_extensions`

children.docstring: Lists all migrations in the database.
children.name: `list_migrations`

children.docstring: Applies a migration to the database. Use this when executing DDL operations.
children.name: `apply_migration`

children.docstring: Executes raw SQL in the Postgres database. Use `apply_migration` instead for DDL operations.
children.name: `execute_sql`

children.docstring: Gets logs for a Supabase project by service type. Use this to help debug problems with your app. This will only return logs within the last minute. If
children.name: `get_logs`

children.docstring: Gets the API URL for a project.
children.name: `get_project_url`

children.docstring: Gets the anonymous API key for a project.
children.name: `get_anon_key`

children.docstring: Generates TypeScript types for a project.
children.name: `generate_typescript_types`

children.docstring: Creates a development branch on a Supabase project. This will apply all migrations from the main project to a fresh branch database. Note that product
children.name: `create_branch`

children.docstring: Lists all development branches of a Supabase project. This will return branch details including status which you can use to check when operations like
children.name: `list_branches`

children.docstring: Deletes a development branch.
children.name: `delete_branch`

children.docstring: Merges migrations and edge functions from a development branch to production.
children.name: `merge_branch`

children.docstring: Resets migrations of a development branch. Any untracked data or schema changes will be lost.
children.name: `reset_branch`

children.docstring: Rebases a development branch on production. This will effectively run any newer migrations from production onto this branch to help handle migration d
children.name: `rebase_branch`
